sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_cmdb_ws.UnifiedMapHelper</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>UnifiedMapHelper</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var UnifiedMapHelper = Class.create();
UnifiedMapHelper.prototype = {

    initialize: function() {},
	
	getMap: function(ciSysId, level) {
		return (new MapService()).getMap(ciSysId, level);
	},
   
	getCiDetails: function(ciSysId, ciClass) {
		return (new MapService()).getCiDetails(ciSysId, ciClass);
	},
	
	//retrieve related item list
	getRelatedList: function() {
		return (new MapRelatedItemService()).getRelatedList();
	},

	//retrieve related item list aggregate count
	getRelatedListAggregate: function(cmdbCis, relTableObjs){
		return (new MapRelatedItemService()).getRelatedListAggregate(cmdbCis, relTableObjs);
	},

	//retrieve the given related table details
	getRelatedItemData: function(config) {
		return (new MapRelatedItemService()).getRelatedItemData(config);
	},

	//retrieve the related application services
	getRelatedApplicationServices: function(ciSysIds) {
		return (new MapService()).getRelatedApplicationServices(ciSysIds);
	},

    type: 'UnifiedMapHelper'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-11-04 00:37:23</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>11cf952e7327301026f6aa114df6a7be</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>266</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>UnifiedMapHelper</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="CMDB Workspace" source="sn_cmdb_ws">c8ab76825371201032b7ddeeff7b1280</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="CMDB Workspace">c8ab76825371201032b7ddeeff7b1280</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_11cf952e7327301026f6aa114df6a7be</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2022-12-13 05:16:09</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
